---
title: "GMT.jl Extensions"
---

<style>
.grid {
  gap: 3px;
}
</style>

GMT.jl provides additional high-level plotting functions and data access utilities that extend GMT's core capabilities with Julia-specific features.

## Quick Links

- [Plotting Extensions](#plotting-extensions) - High-level plotting and visualization
- [Data Processing](#data-processing) - Smoothing, filtering, and statistical analysis
- [Data Conversion](#data-conversion) - Format and coordinate transformations
- [Data Manipulation](#data-manipulation) - Grid and data operations
- [Data Access](#data-access) - Geographic data and remote datasets
- [Geographic Utilities](#geographic-utilities) - Geographic and geospatial tools
- [Geophysical](#geophysical) - Geophysical and Earth science applications
- [Table Operations](#table-operations) - DataFrame-style table joins
- [Miscellaneous](#miscellaneous) - Other utilities

---
